docs.title: Welcome to my documentation
docs.text: You will find some kind stuff here.

docs.title: My media server
docs.text: I have setup a media server to watch some contents at home. Also available from external network trough a VPN.

docs.title: Hardware
docs.text:
My media server run on a NiPoGi AK2 PLUS Mini PC with following specifications :

Processor   :   Intel Alder Lake-N100 
RAM         :   16GB DDR4
Storage     :   512GB M.2 SSD

I also use a Raspberry Pi 3 B+ who host the VPN and a DNS server.

docs.title: Software
docs.text: I use different application to run my media server. All these applications run trough Docker container.
